component.name: PikaTorrent
component.summary: The Torrent app for the 21st century ⚡

description.p: An easy to use Torrent app for everyone.

ul.li: A modern and clean user interface, with dark mode support
Low cpu and memory usage
Add tags to your torrents
Select files to download or to pause
Browse and open files included in your torrents
New theme and logo
Torrents streaming support
Torrents sharing support
Added donation link
Added open folder button
Added button to pause or download all files in a torrent
Bug fixes
Complete application rewrite.
Massive performance improvements
An easy to use, clean, and responsive user interface
Ability to select/unselect files to download
Added a library to quickly download free torrents 🍿
Allow removing a torrent while keeping data
Dark theme is now applied automatically on Linux 🐧
Added statistics dialog in about page 📈
Updated translations and German 🇩🇪 language
Interface, usability improvements, + bug fixes 🐛
A refreshed interface, with true dark theme support (save battery on OLED screens) 🕶️
Improve modals responsiveness 🚀
Support for any search engines urls using a placeholder %s 🔍
Initial support to display errors strings when a torrent has an issue 🔴
Bug fixes: new label input could have erratic behavior, ... 🐛
Display peers and ETA ✈️
Reworked files list, with progress status 🗄️
Moved speed stats to the top 🔝
Fix port number input, elements going offscreen, session info on desktop, ... 🐛
Minor UI improvements 💄
Sort your torrents by name, progress or size ⬇️ ⬆️
Better performances when editing or removing a torrent 🚀
Add advanced settings: uTP, DHT, LPD, PEX, port forwarding, and incoming peer port 🧲
Initial translations into russian 🇷🇺 , Brazilian portuguese 🇧🇷 , and french 🇫🇷
Added archive.org to the default search engines 🗃️
Minor UI improvements 💅
Bug fixes 🪱
